Dec 1 (Reuters) - Post Capital:: *PRESS RELEASE - POST CAPITAL PARTNERS ANNOUNCES THE SALE OF EC WASTE TO 3I GROUP PLC *POST CAPITAL PARTNERS: FINANCIAL TERMS WERE NOT DISCLOSED
